name: Bloodlands
description:
Developed by Louis BICH and Sébastien CHEVALLIER

Only playable with controller.

You can choose Your weapon in the Building Hub, there are 3.

There is a boss in the middle of the area, a cutscene starts when the fight is engaged.

Controls:

Button X: Roll

Button Y: Drink a potion

RT: Attack

Left Joystick: Movement

Right Stick: Camera

Click Right Stick: Lock Camera On a target
